ygData.subject: Re: War/New Factor
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine pushed Serpentors gun to the side forcing the blast to head off into the distance. His gaurd dropped from blocking the blast and he fealt the blade

Lunarpine pushed Serpentors gun to the side forcing the blast to head off
into the distance. His gaurd dropped from blocking the blast and he fealt
the blade slash him in the right thigh. Lunarpine paried with a backslash
with his right arm aiming across Serpentors chest. (If it's close enough to
be point blank range then it's close enough to be knocked away.)

Ice gathered her power and aimed an energy ball at Ares. The negative energy
she was throwing at him wouldn't really hurt him but it would cancel out his
mechanical functions for a short time.


----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:51 AM
Subject: War/New Factor


> (Well, IR, I don't know what you're talking about.  When have I ever said
> that I wanted to dip Iron Raptor into a vat of acid and have Serpentor eat
> IRIS piece by piece?  Besides, Yan told me you had some plans for the
Maxis.
> Attacking the Alliance is something I want to see the Maxis pathetically
fail
> at :P
>
> Cyberwolf, I was waiting for you to reply with your guy, and I doubt
you'll
> take Serpentor down.  Anyway, just because he murdered Luna's girlfriend
is
> no reason to hold a grudge...look at Logomorph!  She's not out to rip my
> spark out!
>
> And last, but not least, Alloran, that would be awesome if the insane
> Galvatron was on the Maximal side.  Evil could finally triumph over the
dark
> forces of the light.  Too bad Hot Rod still isn't evil.  Could have good
> Galvatron fight evil Hot Rod.
>
> Long live the Maximals?  Next thing you know you'll be saying the Maximals
> are good!  But no one will buy that Maxi/Autobot propaganda!)
>
> The Oblitercons (Oblitertron)/Sixshot/Dark Wolf/Double
> Punch/Injector/Manterror/Bumblebee/Ares/Nemesis
> Enforcer/Scattershot/Serpentor/Firestarter:
>
>
>
>
>
> Oblitertron bellowed as the missiles struck his legs, the legs almost
> buckling, but Oblitertron wasn't going to fall that easily.  He raised his
> opened left palm, firing off three fire balls at Gigan.  His optics
glowed,
> and a single optic blast launched out at Gigan.
>
> He felt the few plasma bolts, which were merely like an annoyance to him.
He
> raised his rifle to point at Hysteria, and fired off two bolts that lanced
> out on the attacker.
>
> ---
>
> Sixshot felt the charges hit his form, and could feel the armor starting
to
> peel away at the extreme heat of the lasers.  He wasn't in the mood for
this.
>  He could stay and fight a worthless bot, or shoot a Maximal base.  There
was
> no contendor.
>
> He fired off two bolts from a cannon in both batteries.  Four blasts
lanced
> out at Dinobot.
>
> "Ares," he said over his internal comm. unit, "get over here and take care
of
> this chump for me.
>
> ---
>
> Dark Wolf watched the two other Alliance gestalts, and resisted the urge
to
> run over and tear them apart limb by limb.  The twenty-five foot gestalt
> slammed a fist against his heavily armored chest.  A blue orb of unknown
> energy formed in his left palm.
>
> "Prepare to die, Maximal scum!" he yelled out as he tossed the orb at the
> first bot he saw moving, Tavatron.  (Orb is basically like a grenade that
> blows on impact)
>
> ---
>
> Double Punch watched the lasers and missile hit near him.  He was getting
> upset.  It was getting an inch or so closer every time.  He'd have to run
> farther away from where he opened fire on his enemies so they would fire
at
> the place where he had just been and he'd be safe.
>
> He raised both arms, firing off two energy-signature seeking missiles at
> Sideswipe.
>
> ---
>
> Injector fired off three optic blasts, intercepting the missile, but got
hit
> by all the blasts.  He raked backwards through the air, cursing madly.  He
> raised both arms, firing off two stinger missiles from both launchers at
> Ratchet.
>
> ---
>
> Manterror heard Injector's curses, and decided to stop attacking the CF
and
> help them.  He looked up, firing off three ion disks from his left arm at
> Ratchet.
>
> ---
>
> Bumblebee fired off a quick ten optic blasts at the incoming nails, six of
> them stabbing into his right forearm as he blocked the nails with them.
He
> raised his arms in pain, firing off two stinger missiles from both
launchers,
> watching the four missile sheading for Torca.  At this rate, Bumblebee
would
> have start taking evasive maneuvers.
>
> ---
>
> Ares got up slowly, shaking his head, but was able to understand Sixshot's
> message.
> "Fine." he replied, looking around the battlefield.  He ducked under a
> missile from the CF, and fired off three optic blasts in return, blocked
by
> the shields of the massive, yet damaged ship.
>
> He spotted Sixshot's armored carrier mode, and a robot firing on him.  He
> raised his laser rifle's barrel to point at Dinobot's left arm, firing off
a
> single bolt, still a little groggy from being hit with the numerous
missiles
> in his prior engagement.
>
> ---
>
> Nemesis Enforcer cursed as most of his shots missed, and the rest were
> intercepted by some idiot he'd never seen before.
>
> "YOU'RE ALL AGA--" he was thrown to his left from Tavatron's blast, Iron
> Raptor's powerful looking blasts going right by him.
>
> He straightened out, cursing madly like a pack of donkeys in rage.  He
> activated his comm. unit to to the inner monologue comm. unit in Zardus'
> head.
>
> "This is Nemesis Enforcer.  There are constant new factors.  Send
> reinforcements.  Situation is not critical, but we need reinforcements for
> final victory.  If possible, the War Machines." he said, raising his rifle
as
> he waited for a reply.  "You want to play?  I'll give you something to
play
> with, witch!" he yelled, firing off twenty-five rapid laser bolts off at
Iron
> Raptor's chest.
>
> ---
>
> Scattershot laughed at Nemesis getting hit.  He sighed, hovering in
mid-air.
> He better help him before Nemesis got angry at him.  He raised his rifle,
his
> arms akimbo, firing off 15 rounds at Tavatron's legs.
>
> ---
>
> Serpentor ran back as fast as he could, barely avoiding the enraged
Lunaprine.
>
> On the outside, he made himself look like he was panicked and fearful.
But,
> on the inside, he was crazy.  Besides being crazy, he was being calm, and
had
> already seen the folly of Lunaprine's attack.
>
> He raised his right arm, firing off a blast straight at Lunaprine's chest
> (not sure if it would be considered point blank...), and slashed forward
at
> Lunaprine's right side with his energy blade in his left hand.
>
> ---
>
> Firestarter's craft reached Mach 5 as he quickly sped through the
atmosphere.
> He activated the comm. unit in the ship.  "Shockwave, it is Firestarter, I
> have arrived.  You have no base, I can tell from my scans.  You are
heading
> to an ice continent.  Report as soon as you can.  Unitron is currently in
> battle with Maximals.  I will aid him and his faction."
>
> He ended the transmission, walking over to the only access hatch in his
ship
> and opened it via an access code into a access panel near it.
>
> He leapt out of the ship, activating the boosters in his feet, heading for
> the Cybertronian Fire as he watched his Talon class fighter head for Uluru
in
> the large island continent of Australia.  He watched the craft smash
through
> the top of the large Uluru, and went deep into its center, rock collapsing
on
> top of it.  It was barely noticable there was a hole in Uluru.
>
> He launched off towards the Cybertronian Fire, knowing he would repair the
> damage to Uluru later, but was only interested in battle now.
>
>
>
>
